name: NodeJS
description: NodeJS is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

name: Git
description: Git is a distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code and coordinating work on those changes among multiple people.

name: NodeJS LTS
description: NodeJS is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

name: Postman
description: Postman is an API platform for building and using APIs. Postman simplifies each step of the API lifecycle and streamlines collaboration so you can create better APIs—faster.

name: Docker
description: Docker Desktop is an application for macOS and Windows machines for the building and sharing of containerized applications. Access Docker Desktop and follow the guided onboarding to build your first containerized application in minutes.
